meanings.sent1: The leather was tannable, so it could be turned into a beautiful bag.
meanings.sent2: The tannable hide was perfect for making durable shoes.
meanings.sent3: The tannable material made the shoemaker's job much easier.
meanings.sent4: Her tannable skin glowed in the sunlight like polished wood.
meanings.sent5: The tannable fabric absorbed the dye quickly, creating vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Able to undergo the process of tanning.
meanings.sent1: The tannable hide was prepared for the tanning process.
meanings.sent2: Only tannable leather could be used for crafting quality belts.
meanings.sent3: The tannable material awaited its transformation into a luxurious product.
meanings.sent4: Her tannable coat darkened beautifully after tanning.
meanings.sent5: The tannable fabric retained its softness even after tanning.
